website_summaries.verdict: User-friendly features, generous space, and a practical design put this camera bag at the top of our list.
pros: Features a sliding camera section and accessory compartments
Can be carried by handle, over the shoulder, or as a backpack
Top compartment can fit several articles of clothing
cons: Price is on the higher end of the scale, but this bag offers almost all the features you could hope for when it comes to carrying your camera and gear

customer_reviews.title: Been using this backpack for a lot of my shoots!
customer_reviews.text: It packs a lot of things and is still light. There are many compartments to place your camera, lenses, laptop, and accessories. Zipper end is elastic so it stretches when you pull on the zipper making the zipper less likely to tear off from wear. Buttons are Magnet, not velcro so it lasts. Will definitely keep using this backpack for me shoots.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: The quality and texture are both nice..
customer_reviews.text: The quality and texture are both nice... also the bag can sustain quite some heavy stuff(canon 6d and canon 50d). Would definitely recommend to buyers who're not on a tight budget(too expensive)
customer_reviews.author: Alex Schubert

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, space for all my gear. Straps seem a little short (the main portion of the strap is too short, but there's plenty of slack with the ribbon-like extender). Looks a bit odd when I pull it on.
customer_reviews.author: AnneOfLyon

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really nice and well built. My wife loves it so that’s good enough for me. She will be traveling in a couple of weeks to the Philippines and will put this bag through it’s paces. If she returns and is still happy, I will come back and provide updates
customer_reviews.author: Louis Longoria

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend, and he loved it! I really liked the color and down-side zipper for the camera is amazing, you can use it to store other things as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this when traveling to carry his camera & other electronics.
customer_reviews.author: K27

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, not long lasting but still love it
customer_reviews.text: The bag is absolutely perfect, however the botton the front came off already within the first few months of having it.
customer_reviews.author: the wind

customer_reviews.title: The Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than what i was expected, but its well made camera backpack and i am very satisfied with the quality. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Park Clawson

customer_reviews.title: favorite camera backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my favorite camera backpack. I use a Sony a6300 and I carry a kit lens, 35mm, and 18-105mm. My camera has a battery grip and everything fits except for the 18-105mm which takes up the whole camera space but I made everything fit by separate the lens and the body. I use the tripod strap to carry my job tripod. I like how the backpack is divided by too and bottom so it was easily able to carry all my other accessories. This backpack it’s own raincover! and also a compartment on the top cover flap. I wish there were more options like different color and style. Would definitely recommend if you have small lenses
customer_reviews.author: Victor Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good camera backpack
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a water resistant camera backpack with a camera compartment and another one to put daily stuff. Things that I like: -My Sony A7 II fit easily with its 55mm -Water resistant and come with a rain cover -Cool design -Can take a 13" PC with me -Can take my tripod and strap it on the side -Can take many other things with me in the top compartment Things that I don't like: None In conclusion, this backpack is all I needed and if you are searching for the things I stated above this backpack is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Henri Savin

customer_reviews.title: Great look great buy with camera bag
customer_reviews.text: bought this bag for a honeymoon trip and it worked beautifully!! I drug it all around Italy and England with me. I always felt like my camera was safe. The material is great and the bag is adorable. It held together beautifully. The only thing is that the bag definitely got wet in the rain through the waterproof cover, but I never felt like my camera was in danger. It did rain pretty heavily while I was there, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ya

customer_reviews.title: Great compact backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE that it is not black! I like this back pack because it is great for hiking with camera gear! It is slightly smaller than my other back packs because it does not hold a 15-17 inch laptop. It will hold an 11 inch laptop / tablet. Really convenient pockets & compartments. It has also passed my torture test... most backpacks in one day of use have something tear off of them, when I sue them.
customer_reviews.author: flyingRich

customer_reviews.title: It has too few space for me to put my camera and gears
customer_reviews.text: I expect that it will have a lot of space for my DSLR, one lens and rest of my gear like a small tripod, etc. However, it really cannot put so much stuff in it. The shape of this bag is good and it has a nice looking at the outside, but it definitely cannot be used for who is a professional photographer and have to carry a lot of gear with him. Especially there is nowhere to put the regular size tripod. The color is great but space is limited.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Huang

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend shoots photography and he needed a cost effective bag to carry his equipment. I purchased this for him and he has been loving it! It fits all of his gear and its made with good material. It has two leather straps to close the top of the bag. They are of good quality and don’t seem to break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Camera Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Nicely put together, feels like good material. I was excited because of the side door for the camera. It is a nice size back pack and the straps loosen enough to carry it comfortably. Inside there are pockets for batteries and sd cards. Around the camera itself is room for extra lenses and battery chargers. The top flap opens to a drawstring compartment with quite a bit of room for extra storage. It is a handsome looking backpack.
customer_reviews.author: arleen

customer_reviews.title: Really Easy to use and love the design on it
customer_reviews.text: Really Easy to use and love the design on it. Easy Access to the side. Has enough cushion.. I remove one of the padding and put it right over my camera so it doesn't shift too much - post a picture of it. Otherwise, love the access of it. Love the opening on top, which makes it easy - since being also a mom. If I break my camera to individual pieces, I can also fit my 72-200 lens - which is a pretty big lens.
customer_reviews.author: Muhonen

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok if you don’t need to carry a bunch
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag for about a year an it got to be super inconvenient because you have to slide your laoption through the top into a sleeve that is really hard to get your computer in somethings. I really didn’t have a space for my iPad and the camera compartments Velcro fits weird. Durability was good but I just didn’t like not having separate access to my iPad and laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning it. It's smaller than I thought it would be, also the straps are very uncomfortable and short. The quality isn't great either, I was expecting better for this price. It is really cute though, too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Nick & Meghan Faber

customer_reviews.title: Great bag...Get it
customer_reviews.text: Good bag as advertised. Just wish it had a bottle holder that doesn't share the tripod side of the bag. Maybe y'all could incorporate a lil zip area that allows you to pull out from the side of the bag a bottle mesh/pouch. This bag even has a lil inside space for magazines or small tablet/Surface that slides down through top opening.
customer_reviews.author: turtlkky

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am excited for this bag, fits my Mavic Pro 2 and controller just perfect! I'm using it to carry that pretty much exclusively and am looking forward to hiking with it as it seems really comfortable. It SEEMS well constructed but time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: mayflyaway

customer_reviews.title: This is a good little camera bag for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little camera bag for me. It fits my Nikon D3300 and there's plenty of space for a few extra lenses. My ND filters fit perfectly in the front pocket and there's plenty of space for extra batteries and sd cards. The bag feels like it's made with good quality fabric but I haven't tested the water resistance yet. Great bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chrysta Wong-Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Light and compact
customer_reviews.text: My aim was to get rid of my Laptop and Camera bag while traveling. They were pretty heavy and I always had to deal with two items + the passport and flight tickets hassle while checking in at the airport etc. This pack saves me weight compared to my older setup and I only have one luggage item. I have a 2012 MacBook 13" and it barely fits into the backpack. I'll upgrade to the newer version anyway so I don't mind it because it's way smaller than the old one but tat is something you should be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is actually really nice, however I didn’t end up keeping it because I bought it a little too quick and didn’t realize there wasn’t a place for my computer to fit snug. I’m more of a graphic designer with a hobby of photography so I need a bag that can hold my MacBook Pro... So my main comment is that this bag would be 10 times better with a sleeve to carry my laptop safely. But for style points, this bag is sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Fremgen

customer_reviews.title: Missing rain cover
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag so far, just wish mine had come with the advertised rain cover. I searched every nook and cranny thinking I had overlooked it, to no avail...very disappointed in that, but otherwise satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brogdon

customer_reviews.title: Bought this camera bag for my boyfriend and he loved it! But on the tag it says to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera bag for my boyfriend and he loved it! But on the tag it says to not expose in sun or moisture???? Which is very confusing cause it’s a travel bag and it’s suppose to be waterproof??? Anybody know why?
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Zavala

customer_reviews.title: It is very pretty though, and seems durable
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold much, I thought it would hold more, but I may have misunderstood what I was getting. I wish it had a place to hold a laptop to I could carry that with me on location instead of needing another bag. It is very pretty though, and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: RBrown

customer_reviews.text: Good overall, stylish, etc. Only issue is the lack of snuggle the area with the camera and lens storage has. They tend to slide out of the inner pockets at times and make wearing the bag uncomfortable until you reorganize.
customer_reviews.author: Inigo Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for hiking
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, i used during long vacation in Hawaii and he deserved well. You can store your camera with an easy access on the side and the storage capacity is good. It's a good backpack for photographer.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great storage space
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my fiance and she loves it! She said the quality is great and sturdy and it has great storage.
customer_reviews.author: Adonis v.y

customer_reviews.title: Weight distribution on the back is improper.
customer_reviews.text: Took in on a vacation and had deformed into a curve under weight of camera and lenses. I could feel awkward weight distribution on my back, so was wary to use for long duration. Returned back for refund. The bag is spacious with good storage options. However, I doubt the durability of magnetic clips.
customer_reviews.author: Varun Chadha

customer_reviews.title: Small, light and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great little backpack for adventure photographer who are always on the go. Theres is plenty of space to carry one camera, few lens and small accessories. Also waterproof too !!
customer_reviews.author: Nuttynu

customer_reviews.title: buckles broke after only a month
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this bag and loved it instantly! Yet, the buckles on the front came off after only a month of light use. I was so upset! I tried to fix it, yet they continued to break off. Also the tripod holder definitely does not fit my tripod at all! For the price I would have thought this would have lasted a little longer. Overall I'm just upset with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Vanessendelft

customer_reviews.title: FAST SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the rapid response. This bag is sewn way better than the other one. can't wait to use it. thank you once again
customer_reviews.author: carlaV

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I really did like this bag and used it for our trip to Africa. Its roomy enough to hold my essential camera gear and the top can hold essential daily items or carry on stuff. It will be great for a hiking bag. I love the quick side access. A pocket inside up top and a larger version would make it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Works for me...
customer_reviews.text: Holds everything I need to travel from clothes to camera gear, just a small set up. Side strap for the tripod doesn't lock in place all that well and has started to tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional, aesthetically pleasing, great bag
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag!! It’s so cool and functional, love the fit and the pockets, feels natural to use and looks stunning. A very good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: What really drew me to this bag was the place to hold a tripod. Now, I have the ability to bring it for every outing instead of trying to decide if it would be worth carrying. On top of that, it has plenty of room for everything I need and more. Overall, I am really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Frix

customer_reviews.title: The buckles aren't the best magnetic button snap closures and I can see it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a camera bag so it's bound to be a bit bulky. The buckles aren't the best magnetic button snap closures and I can see it tearing from constant usage. The removable inserts aren't that great either. I'm a bit disappointed that there wasn't a velcro strap to secure the camera body down when it has a lens on. Not too many pockets for stuff either. I just end up shoving everything into the top compartment and don't use the front pocket. I really wanted to love this bag, but at the price point it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JJyang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome layout
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this for carrying cards for a card game I play and it works perfect with how it’s laid out.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The bag is great but a laptop compartment would’ve definitely helped
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great but a laptop compartment would’ve definitely helped. At that price point you would expect a compartment to store a 15in laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Fahad C.

customer_reviews.title: Super roomy bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my old one was too small. This one is super roomy with a lot of compartments! I like the look and feel of it also. Fits all of my accessorie. Love that my tripod fits onto the bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to buying

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic backpack. The material is nice, good padding, fabulous color. I love the side access and the separate compartments. It comes with a rain cover too. I just wish there was room to fit my laptop or tablet for when I use this as a carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon Mango

customer_reviews.title: Enough space for short hikes or walks
customer_reviews.text: Really good and stylish. Few lenses, mavic and camera fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Beerlovesme

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Great bag but the magnet fell off on my first day of use. It should be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: hann

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack for keeping my Nikon safe. The backpack was a little bit bigger then I originally anticipated but it just had more room to put things.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Scamman

customer_reviews.title: Wanted for spotting scope andd tripod
customer_reviews.text: I am going to give this to my nephew for Christmas as I cannot use it. I originally wanted to use it for my spotting scope and thought the inside was large enough to hold it- it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R.

customer_reviews.title: Cool. Maybe a little small, but is elegant and comforable.
customer_reviews.text: Cool. Maybe a little small, but is elegant and comforable.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Z.

customer_reviews.title: Useful and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend - he loves it's multi-functionality!
customer_reviews.author: Cee Lynn

customer_reviews.title: The size of the interior
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. It was too small for my lens
customer_reviews.author: K. Gopinathan MD

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter and her new career. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and her new career. Before I could get it home (had delivered to my work) I had people asking me where they could purchase one for people they knew.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a great backpack. Fits everything nicely, and the convenience of the side camera access is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Danny V.

customer_reviews.title: my camara is smaller but a really love it
customer_reviews.text: Just what i was looking for, my camara is smaller but a really love it
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Looks good however the clasps are terrible
customer_reviews.text: Looks good however the clasps are terrible, fell apart with first use. Bag does not stay closed, poor design. Requesting refund.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I haven't gotten to take it out yet but love the space and accessibility compared to a camera bag
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gotten to take it out yet but love the space and accessibility compared to a camera bag.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Wish it could have been bigger
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack, the design, the creative zippers and storage pouches. I just really wish they made the laptop sleeve bigger. Ill have to carry it for college but other than that everything else fits. Maybe i should invest in a ipad and work from that 🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: marleydad

customer_reviews.title: Best Everyday Camera Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This is my Favorite everyday backpack for vlogging! It’s super comfortable and holds everything I need for the day! Items don’t move around while in transport and it’s super comfortable! Being water resistant and having the ability to put a tripod on the side makes this my favorite bag. The top compartment is great for hold everyday items like food and whatnot. But you can also throw a drone in there! Very stylish love the color way and the material! All around a great day to day bag! Check out my YouTube channel for a review! “Tyler Berry”
customer_reviews.author: Carrie B

customer_reviews.title: I’m disappointed in this bag
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed in this bag. I really loved it and took it with me everywhere for about a month but one of the magnet clasps have now fallen off and I feel like I need to go buy a new bag.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Billington

customer_reviews.title: Camera bag has all the essential features
customer_reviews.text: My husband received this bag as a present and he raves about the fact it has a strap on the side to hold his tripod. His digital camera fits snugly in the side opening and at the top he has a place for all his peripherals and lenses. The straps are adjustable to different body sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Y

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I must say the best camera bag I ever bought it fits my tripod my charger my extra batteries very compact and loving it
customer_reviews.author: huma

product_meta.title: K&F Concept Multi-Functional Camera Backpack 600D Polyester Waterproof Photography Equipment Travel Bag for Tripod DSLR Camera and Accessory with Rain Cover
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueWhy Choose K&F Concept?

√Timely and effective customer service.

√Professional manufacturer for photography products. 

√Dedicated to provide products in high quality & good price. 

Specifications: 

√Item Color: Blue

√Net Weight: 2.1lbs 

√Style type: Modern/Casual 

√Dimension: 10.8"*6.7"*17.3" 

√Capacity: 1 Camera + Multiple lenses 

√Material: 600D Polyester; Lining: Grey 210; Divider: 1.0 PE board + EPE foam 

K&F Concept Camera Backpack

√Designed for SLR DSLR camera and its accessories, its fully padded insert not only separates DSLR from accessories but offers a shock-proof protection. 

√This camera case is well-made of waterproof canvas material, durable and waterproof to protect your belongings from raining. 

√Comfortable on the go, casual, and practical in travelling, hiking, photographing, and other outdoor activities. 

√Quality materials and logical organization ensure your camera is stored safely inside.
feature_bullets: 【Capacity Upgrade】9.84"*6.29"*15.74"; Backpack can hold 1 camera + 3 lenses+ 7-11'' iPad+ Tripod,and other photo essentials.
【Quality Material】This bag made of waterproof 600D polyester,scratch resistant, tear resistant; Grey 210 lining; PE board + EPE foam divider,strong and solid, shock relief and decompression.
【Safety Design】Professional backside access guarantees the safety of your gear, anti-theft; Rightside access lets you get your gear without putting the bag down.
【Easy Travel】Breathable air-mesh widened and thickened shoulder strap and back; Adjustable chest belt keeps the straps tight on you shoulders,reduce weight, easy for long time travel.
【Intimate Protection】Super practical backpack rain cover,anti-dirty anti-dust,better protect your camera essentials in the outdoor.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars102 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
